note.p: Friend of Emma Darwin’s. Daughter of Gideon Acland and Maria Lawford. Married John Harrison in 1831. Lived in Bristol.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1951/352/26)
Certificate of death, 13 March 1884, St Augustine, Bristol (General Register Office, England)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 October 2016)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 October 2016)
